name: Missile Mania
description:
The city is under attack from a rebel group and all other defenses have been destroyed. You are the last thing that stands between salvation and certain destruction for the families of your city. Armed with a missile defense weapon and EMP charges, you can protect everyone....if you're fast enough. Missile Mania is not for the faint of heart and beating this will not be easy. Only the best will be able to hold back this wave of destruction. Good luck, defender!

**Online ranks coming soon!
